revisions.*: Because "rvslots" was not specified, a legacy format has been used for the output. This format is deprecated, and in the future the new format will always be used.

{{Taxobox | name = ''Paxillus vernalis'' {{Italic title}} | image = Paxillus filamentosus 25465.jpg | image_width = 234px | regnum = [[Fungi]] | divisio = [[Basidiomycota]] | classis = [[Agaricomycetes]] | ordo = [[Boletales]] | familia = [[Paxillaceae]] | genus = ''[[Paxillus]]'' | species = '''''P. filamentosus''''' | binomial = ''Paxillus filamentosus'' | binomial_authority = ([[Scop.]]) [[Elias Magnus Fries|Fr.]] (1838) | synonyms = ''Agaricus filamentosus'' Scop. (1772)
''Paxillus rubicundulus'' [[P.D.Orton]] (1969) }} {{mycomorphbox | name = ''Paxillus filamentosus'' | whichGills = decurrent | capShape = depressed | hymeniumType=gills | stipeCharacter=bare | ecologicalType=mycorrhizal | sporePrintColor=brown | howEdible=unknown}} '''''Paxillus adelphus (Paxillus filamentosus, Paxillus rubicundulus'''''), commonly known as the '''alder roll-rim''', is a [[basidiomycete]] [[fungus]] which is associated with alder (''[[Alnus]]'') in northern Europe and southwestern [[Greenland]], and North America. It closely resembles ''[[Paxillus involutus]]'', but its [[basidiocarp|fruit bodies]] are generally smaller. ==References== {{Reflist|refs= {{cite book |last=Knudson |first=Henning |title=Arctic and Alpine Mycology 6 |publisher=Museum Tusculanum Press |location=Copenhagen, Denmark |date=2006 |page=12 |isbn=87-635-1277-7 |url=https://books.google.com/books?id=5OxJHNY6PGcC&pg=PA12}} {{cite book |last=Michell |first=Kate |title=Field Guide to Mushrooms and Other Fungi of Britain and Europe |publisher=New Holland Publishers |date=2006 |page=94 |isbn=1-84537-474-6|url=https://books.google.com/books?id=X96A6iQwvV4C&pg=PA94}} {{cite book |author=Suomen Metsätieteellinen Seura |title=Acta Forestalia Fennica |url=https://books.google.com/books?id=RfXzAAAAMAAJ |year=1970 |publisher=Suomen Metsätieteellinen Seura}} }} ==External links== *{{MycoBank|438797}} {{Taxonbar|from=Q4458295}} [[Category:Paxillaceae]] [[Category:Fungi described in 1772]] [[Category:Fungi of Europe]] [[Category:Fungi of North America]]
